name: CVE-2014-4077
description: Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, and Office 2007 SP3, when IMJPDCT.EXE (aka IME for Japanese) is installed, allow remote attackers to bypass a sandbox protection mechanism via a crafted PDF document, aka "Microsoft IME (Japanese) Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability," as exploited in the wild in 2014.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:itanium:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:server_core:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:itanium:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:itanium:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:server_core:*:*:x64:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2007:sp3:*:*:ime:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:sp1:*:*:*:*:x86:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:server_core:*:*:*:itanium:*')]
